features: EXPERIENCE THE BENEFITS OF ROSE WATER FACE MIST: Our rose water toner is formulated to hydrate and revitalize your skin. Achieve radiant, glowing skin with this refreshing face spray mist hydrating formula.

REFRESH & HYDRATE WITH ROSE TONER: Our rose water spray is a must-have for your skincare routine. This rosewater spray provides deep hydration, leaving your skin looking radiant and glowing. In Spanish, you would call this agua de rosas para la cara hidratante.
REVITALIZE YOUR SKIN: Our hydrating face mist is designed to rejuvenate and nourish your skin. Enjoy the hydrating benefits of this face mist hydrating spray for a radiant complexion.

GENTLE & NOURISHING FACE TONER: Discover the power of our toner, made with organic witch hazel extract. This hydrating toner for face is perfect for sensitive skin, providing a gentle and soothing experience. It makes a great toner for sensitive skin or any skin type.

WOMAN FOUNDED, MADE IN THE USA & CRUELTY FREE: Our company takes pride in being woman founded and owned and manufacturing in the USA. Rest assured, our facial spray is certified cruelty-free and vegan. Enjoy the outcomes of hydrated, radiant, and glowing skin guilt-free.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The rose toner is a game-changer! The scent is amazing, and using it every morning leaves my skin looking and feeling fantastic. It's become a crucial step in my skincare routine, adding a refreshing touch and prepping my skin for the day. This toner is truly a must for a well-rounded skincare regimen.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Staple in the make up bag
reviews.reviewText: I love how this smells and feels, I also really absolrbs my face products- i use it morning and night don’t go without it. I travel a lot so I Alyse’s have one in my travel bag to be sure I don’t leave home without it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I struggle with combination skin which gets dry, but very oily. For many yrs I hate when I go to an event or even outside & immediately after my shower with good face wash I switch from Kylie Jenner foam face wash, but recently bought the debascus rose oil cleanser which I love. I decided to by this beauty rose spray and wohhhh what a difference it's made in the past few days. My face has evened out so no more bumps, uneven skin tone and my face isn't oily at all, it looks so amazing & healthy. My fiance asked me what I've been using on my face & I showed him the amazing product I purchased. (I wish I was a selfy kinda girl cuz I tell ya I'd show ya all a before & after pic...but u never been that kinda girl lol) 🤦‍♀️ I spritz it on my face then add some to a cotton ball after my face is washed and it looks like I just spent a million $ for a facial. It's soooo smooth feeling that I could touch my face all day, but we all know how many germs are on our hands, so I have to tell myself to 🛑 stop!!! The package arrived quickly and securely. I will definitely order more once this bottle gets about 3/4 gone. Don't hesitate...give it a try u won't be disappointed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I like the product but I hate the price. It’s nice to have a toner I can just spray on after my shower but I can also spray some on a cotton pad in the morning for quick application. It absorbs really fast and doesn’t leave an oily feeling residue like other products can on my skin and I defiantly don’t think it’s caused any breakouts, which is rare for me with any product. Man, I just wish this wasn’t so pricy for what it is.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It took me some time to post this review because I wanted to see how my skin would benefit from this product. I got it in May and was using the mist throughout the summer. I must report that my skin took it very well! )) is a great rose water mist toner to use during the day as a quick pick-me-up and for added hydration which is crucial for my skin during hot and humid New York summer. Also, it falls in the price range that I deem very affordable. It smells amazing too 😻 I would definitely recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Refreshing and Highly Recommended
reviews.reviewText: I recently had the pleasure of trying out the Rosewater Face Mist, and I must say, it exceeded my expectations in every way. This product is not only exceptionally good, but it also provides a refreshing experience that I highly recommend to others.First and foremost, the fragrance of the rosewater is absolutely divine. The gentle floral scent instantly transports you to a serene garden, creating a calming and relaxing ambiance. It's like a breath of fresh air for your senses, leaving you feeling rejuvenated and invigorated.The mist itself is incredibly fine and lightweight, ensuring an even and delicate application. With just a few spritzes, it effortlessly covers your face, creating a soothing and moisturizing layer. I particularly appreciate how it absorbs quickly into the skin, without leaving any greasy or sticky residue behind. It's perfect for any time of day, whether you need a quick pick-me-up or a soothing mist before bed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Less expensive and just as effective as expensive brands
reviews.reviewText: This really calms the skin after shaving for me. It also stops most razor bumps. It absolutely rehydrates the skin after shaving. Feels necessary as part of my shaving routine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Love this rose water facial toner by Beauty by Earth 😍 Normally I don’t like witch Hazel, but this must have a mini amount cuz it doesn’t not dry or irritate my face. I actually think it is very moisturizing. Smells amazing too 🧖🏽‍♀️The product can be found on Amazon. Try it out and let me know what you think!

Okay, but this Rose Water Toner is an absolute must-have! I've been using this product for over 2 weeks now, and it has left my skin feeling clean & refreshed.I have pretty sensitive skin, and most toners I've used in the past have always felt very dry and itchy on my skin because of the harsh chemical ingredients, so I always avoided using them. But not with this toner because it's made with clean ingredients which are paraben & chemical free, non-toxic, not tested on animals and vegan. Not to mention, the toner smells just like a fresh bouquet of roses.I'm really happy that I finally found a toner that is perfect for my skin type.

Ottimo prodotto per tutti i tipi di pelle, grasse, normali e sensibili! In famiglia lo usiamo tutti. Inci perfetto e completamente naturale, contiene tra l ' altro succo d' aloe e acqua di rose, che mantengono la pelle fresca e idratata tutto il giorno! Da ricomprare

Endlich ein Gesichtswasser OHNE Alkohol oder sonstigen Kram, der auf sensibler und/oder akneanfälliger Haut nichts zu suchen hat.Habe es wirklich gerne benutzt und mittlerweile auch komplett aufgebraucht, muss aber auch anmerken, dass es KEIN Wunderprodukt ist. Rötungen, Pickel, Pickelmale, Trockenheitsfältchen oder sonstige Störfaktoren werden davon alleine leider auch nicht verschwinden, aber nach der abendlichen Reinigung aufgesprüht wirkt es wunderbar erfrischend und kühlend, gerade bei recht kalkhaltigem Wasser.Darauf dann ein paar Tropfen Rosehip Oil einmassiert (und in der kalten Jahreszeit auch zusätzlich etwas Sheabutter) und die Haut fühlt sich rundum wohl.Auch morgens nach dem Aufstehen entweder nach dem Waschen (mit Wasser) aufsprühen, oder einfach nur das Gesichtswasser auf einen Wattepad geben und das Gesicht sorgfältig abwischen, danach etwas Sheabutter drauf und fertig.Werde es mir bestimmt mal wieder nachkaufen, aber das wohl nur wegen des guten Gefühls UND wegen des frischen, natürlichen Geruchs.

Me ha encantado el producto. Lo elegí por ser natural y por la política de la empresa con respecto al no uso de animales en pruebas. Lo uso a diario y me refresca e hidrata la piel pero no la deja gasa. Además, huele muy bien y el tacto es muy agradable.Hecho en falta una gama más amplia de esta marca en Amazon.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on November 30, 2015
reviews.reviewTitle: it is really good, refreshing and good value for money
reviews.reviewText: I bought this toner as it was on special offer. I must say, it is really good, refreshing and good value for money. I also got a peppermint lip balm as a free bonus item in the box - always nice to get a surprise. Would I buy it again, yes - but would need to check the price as it was a really good deal when I bought it.
